title: 820-01700 quarter fan spin?
message:
Liquid damage around Q5480.

Damaged components replaced. Traces are OK,

No chime.
20V on charger and it take 2.2A short but fast fan spin and reboot.
Trackpad clicks, caps lock LED not working.

Any idea?

title: 820-01700 quarter fan spin?
message:
Check SMC_PBUS_VSENSE level.
Try starting in SMC bypass mode.

title: 820-01700 quarter fan spin?
message:
SMC_PBUS_VSENSE 1.04V

No luck with SMC bypass mode - only sign of life is trackpad .

title: 820-01700 quarter fan spin?
message:
PPBUS_G3H voltage is stable?
AWAKE and SLPS2R voltages present?

title: 820-01700 quarter fan spin?
message:
PPBUS_G3H got 12.6V but there is drop to around 10V during that short fan spin and then again stable 12.6V

PP1V2_AWAKE 1.2V and when fan spin drop to 0V and then back to 1.2V
PP1V8_AWAKE 1.8V and when fan spin drop to 0V and then back to 1.8V

PP1V8_SLPS2R present
P1V1SLPS2R_SW0 present
PP0V8_SLPS2R present

title: 820-01700 quarter fan spin?
message:
Is the battery charing?
Try to start with battery connected.

title: 820-01700 quarter fan spin?
message:
Is the battery charing?
Try to start with battery connected.

title: 820-01700 quarter fan spin?
message:
I connected battery and got 20.1V and 0.06A from charger which is around 1.2W.

After 15 minutes USB C meter shows there was 14mAh "used"

PPVBAT_G3H_CONN have a few second 12.6V and then a few seconds 0.16V

title: 820-01700 quarter fan spin?
message:
Does the board try to start when battery is connected?
Try using SWK000/2 pads, instead of power button.

title: 820-01700 quarter fan spin?
message:
Trackpad click, but no short fan spin.

No luck with SWK000/2 pads.

title: 820-01700 quarter fan spin?
message:
Trackpad click is irrelevant.
Is an hardware response, once its coils are energized.
Do not consider the click as life sign.

I was expecting you will check for reaction on S5 voltages, or S4 signal.

title: 820-01700 quarter fan spin?
message:
"Do not consider the click as life sign." - thank you , will remember that
           
       
PP3V3_S5 - 0V
PP1V8_S5 - 0V
PP5V_S5_LDO - 5.13V
PP5V_S4_T_USBC - 0V
PP5V_S4_X_USBC - 0V                                   

Will that help?

title: 820-01700 quarter fan spin?
message: With battery connected (and charger), check for reaction at 3v3_S5 (at same time) when trigger PMU_ONOFF_L; use SWK000/2 pads.
